title: Janajﾄ》iya Oral Traditions and the Animistic Roots of Sanﾄ》ana Dharma: Evidence, Correlations, and Continuities
dek: An evidence-based exploration of the animistic and tribal roots of Sanﾄ》ana Dharma, pairing oral traditions with archaeological, geological, and epigraphic data from across the Indian subcontinent.
culturalNotes: Uses confidence-graded methodology (A-D) for evidence stratification
Pairs each cultural claim with material anchors where possible
Integrates janajﾄ》iya (tribal) perspectives with Sanskritic traditions
